sys_script_include.description: Checks if the given application's manual page contains valid release notes. If the application has a manual page and if the manual page contains a "Release Notes" section, then it checks if there is a sub-section titled with the current version and the current date. Returns true, if no "Release Notes" section can be found OR the subsection exists, or false, if the sub-section does not exist.
sys_script_include.name: AppVersionBaselineCheckReleaseNotes
